sources.title: Santa Claus in the House (ROMANTIC COMEDY full movie German, 2024 Christmas movies in full length)

metadata.Plot: Scott and Kate Johansson are elated to discover their daughter Alex has been accepted into bucknell university. However, the town college scholarship program refuses to fund any more tuitions. Out of options, the couple makes an executive decision to open an underground illegal casino in their friend Frank's basement. Unfortunately, the authorities soon become suspicious. Now what?!
metadata.Actors: Will Ferrell, Amy Poehler, Ryan Simpkins
